display_long_description:
Requiring a real basketball to play, Qourt Vision XR is a first-of-its-kind mixed reality training tool specifically engineered for basketball players looking to improve their ability to make spilt-second decisions. Enhance your cognitive skills like never before by mastering offensive principles such as: attacking the top foot, assessing a closeout, splitting-the-screen, rolling off the inside shoulder, knowing when to euro step, and much more. Get the mental and physical reps needed to build true self-confidence while immersing yourself in the future of film study and player-development.📈

SEE QUICK and REACT FAST with interactive drills focused on💪: 

o	Change-Of-Pace
o	Change-Of-Direction
o	Footwork
o	Balance
o	Fluidity
o	Rhythm
o	Hand/ Eye Coordination
o	Agility
o	Strength and Conditioning
o	Creating Space/ Separation

MAKE YOUR MIND SWEAT with signature exercises designed for🧠:

o	Decision-Making
o	Reaction Time
o	Pattern Recognition
o	Attention Shifting
o	Multi-Tasking
o	Anticipation
o	Inhibition
o	Visual Processing
o	Problem-Solving
o	Proprioception

Say goodbye to plastic cones, chairs, and trashcans.🚫

REAL WORKOUTS. UNREAL DECISIONS.🏀🏆 #QourtVisionXR
